objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='backgroundGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1a1a2e'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#0f0f1a'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='purpleGlow' cx='30%' cy='30%' r='50%' fx='30%' fy='30%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#9d4edd;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#9d4edd;stop-opacity:0'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='blueGlow' cx='20%' cy='70%' r='60%' fx='20%' fy='70%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#4361ee;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#4361ee;stop-opacity:0'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#backgroundGradient)'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#purpleGlow)'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#blueGlow)'/><g opacity='0.5'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='50' fill='none' stroke='#9d4edd' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='70' fill='none' stroke='#4361ee' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='80' cy='300' r='40' fill='none' stroke='#9d4edd' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='200' cy='400' r='60' fill='none' stroke='#4361ee' stroke-width='2'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M0,0 L100,100 L0,200 Z' fill='#9d4edd'/><path d='M0,300 L150,450 L0,600 Z' fill='#4361ee'/><path d='M0,700 L120,820 L0,940 Z' fill='#9d4edd'/></g><rect x='540' y='0' width='2' height='1080' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
WIRELESS TWS WITH
LED LIGHT SHOW

• 80W Peak Stereo Sound
• LED Light Show Effect
• Bluetooth 5.0 TWS Technology

product_details.description: 【Incredible Sound Loved by million people】YIER wireless bluetooth speaker has a 80w(Peak) output power and the latest 4 drivers. (2 full-range drivers and 2 tweeter driver). Meanwhile，it is debugged by professional audio engineers. So YIER wireless speakers get enhanced bass, tight mids and crystal clear highs without distortion at any volume. Its sound is loved by millions of listeners. 【Beast Stereo Sound & Advanced Bluetooth 5.0】YIER Wireless speaker equipped with state-of-the-art Bluetooth 5.0 technology, it can easily pair two bluetooth speakers. Press the TWS button and you will get immediately 160w stereo surround sound, let you enjoy the same sound as concerts and concerts at home. Besides, you can use it in the backyard jobsite garage garden kitchen beach,this speaker is enough to fill the house. 【Rich Punch Bass & Beats Driven Light Show】YIER party speaker is equipped with the latest bassup technology. Press this Bass button, this speaker will packs a punch and is enough to fill the whole party with music. And with the excellent rhythm light show, your party will more shine. Let's start preparing for summer vacations and parties. 【Wooden Speaker】What makes the 'perfect' speaker enclosure? -Definitely a wood framed speaker. Beacuse Wood naturally non-resonant, so energising a speaker box with musical vibrations will result in minimal distortion. Wood has a high density, It has been used for centuries to help amplify a richer, clearer sound in instruments from guitars to grand pianos. So a speaker enclosure made of wood, and made well, will naturally sound good. 【12 Months Warranty Service】Enhance your Christmas party atmosphere with our portable speaker. This special package includes 1 speaker, 1 USB-C cable, 1 AUX cable, and 1 user manual. The speaker is equipped with 4 high-capacity rechargeable batteries, each with a capacity of 2500mAh, providing a total of 10000mAh for extended usage. Enjoy 4-18 hours of battery life, depending on your volume and lighting mode preferences. Rest assured, all YIER products come with a 12-month warranty and 24-hour online customer service. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Brand - YIER ** Speaker Maximum Output Power - 200 Watts ** Frequency Response - 45 Hz ** Connectivity Technology - Wireless, Bluetooth, Auxiliary, USB ** Audio Output Mode - Surround, Stereo **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, tech-inspired layout promoting an electronic product. The left half of the design is styled with a dark gradient background accented by overlapping radial and triangular shapes in violet and blue hues, creating an energetic tech ambiance. The center-left hosts a prominent headline (`heading`) in a futuristic sans-serif font, followed by a bold subheading (`subheading`) that highlights a key selling point. Detailed bullet points (`description`) provide additional specifications. The banner also features clear pricing (`price`) in vibrant blue and a call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) in purple for immediate engagement. The right half features a high-resolution image of the product (`product_image`), seamlessly integrated over the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: `#0f0f1a`
- Dark Purple: `#1a1a2e`
- Electric Blue: `#4361ee`
- Vivid Purple: `#9d4edd`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features a modern, edgy speaker with a bold color palette perfect for an energetic advertisement banner. Dominating colors include deep black (#0D0D0D) in the speaker casing, used to create a sense of sophistication and contrast. Vibrant neon hues like electric cyan (#00E5FF) and vivid magenta (#D500F9) form glowing rings around the speaker drivers, reflecting movement and energy. White (#FFFFFF) accents highlight functional buttons and branding, enhancing legibility. The LED colors blend in a seamless gradient transition, creating a dynamic visual effect while maintaining emphasis through inner luminescence. Overall, the palette exudes a futuristic and stylish vibe.
